citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Five adult servals are not current on rabies vaccinations (per due dates located on medical documentation/vaccine
certificates) and are past due for annual exams. The program of veterinary care (PVC) states that exams are to be
completed annually. Failure to follow the instructions of the attending veterinarian my result in animal health problems due
to lack of veterinary oversight. The licensee must schedule annual exams and vaccines to be completed as stated in the
PVC.
To be corrected by December 1st, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
Additional Inspectors:
KEVIN WILKEN, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOR n

narrative:
2.40(a)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Five adult servals are not current on rabies vaccinations (per due dates located on medical documentation/vaccine 
certificates) and are past due for annual exams. The program of veterinary care (PVC) states that exams are to be 
completed annually. Failure to follow the instructions of the attending veterinarian my result in animal health problems due 
to lack of veterinary oversight. The licensee must schedule annual exams and vaccines to be completed as stated in the

This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
